title: Farfetch - Frontend Engineer
description: I have been worker in page of product at farfetch.com, I developed components for Design System. At the now I am working in new contract withGraphql. My journey have been important for incresse knowledge as developer and personalaty.

title: GISCON
description: I was the responsible person for the development of a Web platform focused on management and access control, planning and software development. I was also the responsible person for the development of tools which allow interoperability and data update between heterogeneous systems.

title: Symbiotic technology for societal eﬀiciency gains
description: In this project I was the responsible person for the development of the Web platform, focused and aimed to the management of users profiles in an hospital environment.

title: INTELLITAG – Smart Tags
description: In this project I developed a reading and writting software of RFID Tags in which the purpose of it was to re-write RFID Tags that had not being coded yet. During that project I developed as well tasks focusing in the development and interoperability of a Web platform aimed to the Business Intelligence.

title: Intelligent Support System for Intensive Care Medicine
description: Developed a system of data collection in Python, built with many clients and a single server which communicates with an Oracle database, been the datacollected supported for the models of Data Mining developed in R.
